sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for separation of liquids using a distillation unit.
sections.scope: Applicable to simple and fractional distillation in the Pharmaceutical Chemistry laboratory.
procedure: Add the liquid mixture to the distillation flask.
Collect the distillate in a receiving flask.
After completion, switch OFF heating and dismantle the setup.
sections.precautions: Do not overheat. Ensure continuous water flow through condenser.
